unnormalised: Good news for coastal travellers! A new ferry service is all set to launch from Mumbai to Goa, starting on 10/11/2024. This could cut travel time significantly, offering a comfy alternative to the 12-hr Konkan railway journey or the usual 10 hr bus ride. Imagine sipping chai on deck while enjoying the sea breeze – quite the upgrade, no?
normalised: Good news for coastal travelers! A new ferry service is all set to launch from Mumbai to Goa, starting on tenth november two thousand and twenty four. This could cut travel time significantly, offering a comfy alternative to the twelve hour Konkan railway journey or the usual ten hour bus ride. Imagine sipping chai on deck while enjoying the sea breeze – quite the upgrade, no?

unnormalised: The ferry, MV Coastal Cruise, boasts a capacity of 300 passengers and will initially run 3 times a week. Fares are expected to start from Rs. 3500, with various classes offering different amenities. You can book tickets online at www.coastalcruise.in from 01/10/2024 onwards. Keep an eye out for promo offers!
normalised: The ferry, M-V Coastal Cruise, boasts a capacity of three hundred passengers and will initially run three times a week. Fares are expected to start from rupees three thousand five hundred, with various classes offering different amenities. You can book tickets online at www.coastalcruise.in from first october two thousand and twenty four onwards. Keep an eye out for promo offers!

unnormalised: This is a game-changer for tourism in both states. Forget crowded trains and winding roads – now you can cruise between Mumbai and Goa in style! The ferry departs from Ferry Wharf, Mumbai at 9 AM and is expected to arrive in Panjim by 6:00 PM. Perfect for a weekend getaway, don't you think?
normalised: This is a game-changer for tourism in both states. Forget crowded trains and winding roads – now you can cruise between Mumbai and Goa in style! The ferry departs from Ferry Wharf, Mumbai at nine A-M and is expected to arrive in Panjim by six P-M. Perfect for a weekend getaway, don't you think?
